name: hardening_profiles_tags
schema:
CREATE TABLE `hardening_profiles_tags` (
	`hardening_profile_id` text NOT NULL,
	`tag_id` text NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY(`hardening_profile_id`, `tag_id`),
	FOREIGN KEY (`hardening_profile_id`) REFERENCES `hardening_profiles`(`id`) ON UPDATE no action ON DELETE cascade,
	FOREIGN KEY (`tag_id`) REFERENCES `tags`(`id`) ON UPDATE no action ON DELETE cascade
)
